text:
Whoa. You just gave your first Shoutout. Great job! :clap:
When you give Shoutout, I count all the reactions added to them forever! Make your Shoutout even more awesome with emoji. Something like:
> shoutout <@U4V22C6A1> for giving your first shoutout :muscle: :100: :raised_hands:
I can only see shoutout if I'm a member of the channel. Invite me to your fav channels so I don't miss any. 

To invite me, send `invite #my-fav-channel` to me directly!

_If you gave Shoutout by accident, you can delete it <https://prospela.growbot.io/undefined/5/|here> or by deleting your message_
